animeTitle: Isobe Isobee with Nakata Yasutaka de Sourou
animeDescription: DJ and music producer Yasutaka Nakata known for his work with Perfume and Kyary Pamyu Pamyu Nakata recruited the characters from Isobe Isobee Monogatari to star in a promotional video for his new single "Seiseseiseiseiseseisei."
animeRelated: ['Adaptation: Isobe Isobee Monogatari: Ukiyo wa Tsurai yo', 'Parent story: Isobe Isobee Monogatari: Ukiyo wa Tsurai yo (2015)']
